text: The Piccio family is a family of Portuguese Jewish origin. The family's name is an Italianisation of the original Portuguese Figo.Stow, K. (1995). The Jews in Rome (Vol. 1). Leiden: Brill. ==People== *Efrem Piccio, Venetian rabbi *Lazzaro Piccio, Venetian rabbi *Vicente Mond√©jar Piccio, a general in the Philippine air force ==References== Category:Italian families
title: Piccio
